txt.en:
'There are things you need to learn before I continue your instruction, and not all of them can be learned here.

'Before we continue, [placeholder], I want you to speak with another member of our order, Mosco Mudbottom. You will find him at Ost Guruth in the Lone-lands, far to the north and west of Moria.

'Mosco, I am sure, will have a task for you. Think of this as part of your training...a test of endurance and patience.'

'Well met, [placeholder]. You have the look of one of our order about you.

'Sadreda sent you, you say? Well, I can see why. You have the look of an experienced adventurer that yearns for more knowledge.

'I think I know just the thing.'
'Mosco Mudbottom may be found at Ost Guruth in the Lone-lands.'
Sadreda has more for you to do, but requires one last task of endurance before he begins.
Talk to Mosco Mudbottom at Ost Guruth
Mosco Mudbottom can be found at Ost Guruth in the Lone-lands, far to the north and west of Moria.\n\nSadreda has instructed you to speak with a warden by the name of Mosco Mudbottom.
